update_required.message:
We‚Äôve added support for multiple images. Older versions of the app are not compatible with this change and may remove extra images, keeping only one.

If you use Eating Buddy on more than one device, make sure all devices are updated to version 4.5.0 or later.
update_required.title: Update All Devices

challenges.browse_our_collection_or: Browse our collection to find something exciting or
challenges.cannot_join_challenge_conflict: You cannot join this challenge because you are already enrolled in {{name}}.

challenges.cannot_join_challenge_required: To join this challenge, you first have to complete {{name}}.
challenges.cannot_join_challenge_too_many: You can't join this challenge because you have already enrolled in five challenges.
challenges.since_offline_first: Because the app is designed to work even without an internet connection, challenges are independent and only appear on the device where they were started.
challenges.some_challenges_are_not_shown: Some challenges aren't shown because they were started on another device
challenges.we_know_its_not_perfect: We know this isn‚Äôt ideal for everyone, and we appreciate your patience as we prioritize simplicity and reliability.
challenges.you_have_not_completed: You haven't completed any challenges yet.

google_drive_not_authorized.title: Drive access was not granted
google_drive_not_authorized.body: Please allow the app to use Google Drive.

errors.account_change: iCloud account has changed. You can re-enable sync with your new account in the app settings.
errors.apple_server_error: We're unable to sync right now due to an issue with Apple‚Äôs servers.
errors.icloud_not_supported: iCloud is disabled or not supported on this device. Please check your settings
errors.internal_error: An unexpected iCloud error occurred. Please let us know if the problem persists.
errors.network_error: We couldn't complete the operation due to a network issue. Please check your connection and try again.
errors.not_authenticated: You‚Äôre not signed in to iCloud. Please sign in from system settings.
errors.quota_exceeded: iCloud storage is full. Free up space, then re-enable sync in the app settings to continue syncing.
errors.zone_deleted: iCloud sync is no longer available, possibly due to changes in iCloud settings.

cloud.ios_version_too_low: Automatic iCloud sync is not available. Please update to iOS 17 or later.

access.title: Apple Health Access
access.description: Eating Buddy reads the following data from Apple Health

workouts.title: Workouts
workouts.description: to understand activity levels in relation to eating patterns

state_of_mind.title: State of Mind
state_of_mind.description: to reflect mood trends in relation to eating habits

sleep.title: Sleep
sleep.description: to understand how sleep patterns relate to eating habits and overall wellbeing

access.footer: This data is used only to provide insights inside the app and is analyzed together with your eating entries.
access.if_no_data_is_shown: If no data is shown, please check that access is enabled for Eating Buddy in the Apple Health app.

how_tos.add_drinks_a: On the Home screen, tap the <icon/> button in the upper-right corner to add your drinks and their details.
how_tos.android_notifications_q: Why don‚Äôt I receive reminders, or why are they delayed?
how_tos.android_notifications_a: On Android, the system may optimize battery for apps, which can delay or block notifications. Press here to open your app‚Äôs settings and make sure Notifications are enabled and Battery optimization/Background activity is set to Unrestricted/Don‚Äôt optimize.
how_tos.check_in_a: Yes, press the corresponding <icon/> button from the hunger scale
how_tos.check_in_q: I am not planning to eat. Can I just check-in my hunger/satiety level?
how_tos.delete_meal_a: Press and hold the meal on the Timeline screen to access the quick menu and then select Delete.
how_tos.delete_meal_q: How can I delete a meal?
how_tos.edit_meal_details_a: Just tap the meal in your timeline to open the Meal Details screen. From there, you can update your fullness level, add or edit notes, manage tags, and adjust other meal-related details.
how_tos.edit_meal_details_q: How do I edit the details of a meal, like satisfaction level, notes, or tags?
how_tos.not_log_foods_a: Yes, press and hold the corresponding button on the hunger scale.
how_tos.not_log_foods_q: Writing down what and why I'm eating doesn't appeal to me right now. Could I just mark that I ate without logging any food?
how_tos.past_meal_a: When adding a meal, tap the ‚ãÆ menu icon in the upper-right corner. From there, you can select the meal type and set the date and time.
how_tos.past_meal_q: How can I log a past meal?
how_tos.post_meal_a: You can long-press the meal on the Timeline screen and a quick menu will pop up, allowing you to select the post-meal state.
how_tos.post_meal_q: How can I quickly log how I feel after eating?
how_tos.whats_a_smallwin_a: A Small Win is when you pause instead of eating from a craving that isn‚Äôt real hunger, and the feeling fades. Marking it helps you track progress and see that these moments add up.

images.title: Image limit reached
images.body: You can add up to 5 images per meal. Remove one or start another meal to add more.

text.title: Entry limit reached
text.body: You can add up to 5 text entries per meal. Remove one or start another meal to add more.

onboarding.based_on_your_preferences: Based on your preferences, we've selected these challenges from our vast collection!
onboarding.challenges_are_our_premium_feature: Challenges are our premium feature offering a fun, structured way to stay on track and reach your goals.
onboarding.congratulations: Congratulations on taking the first step towards mastering your eating habits.
onboarding.how_to_be_called: How would you like to be called?
onboarding.want_to_track_what_drives_you_to_eat: Want to track what drives you to eat?
onboarding.we_provide_a_private_space: We provide a private, judgment-free space for you to explore and improve your relationship with food. It's a long road, and we're here to support you every step of the way.
onboarding.we_think_you_d_love_these: We think you'd love these challenges
onboarding.we_think_you_d_love_this_track: We think you'd love this set of challenges
onboarding.we_will_add_the_homemade_tag_2: tag to your Log Food screen
onboarding.we_will_turn_on_mindfulness_tracking: We‚Äôll display your mindfulness chart and related statistics on the Trends page.
onboarding.we_will_prompt_you_to_reflect_on_your_re: We will prompt you to reflect on your reasons if you choose to eat when you're not actually hungry.
onboarding.would_you_like_to_cook_more: Want to keep track of homemade meals?

paywall.amplify_your_motivation: Amplify your motivation by turning healthy eating into a game you can win!
paywall.automatically_back_up: Automatically back up and sync across your devices.
paywall.billing_starts: Billing starts at the end of your free trial unless you cancel.
paywall.discover_how_drinks: Discover how your beverage choices influence eating patterns.
paywall.earn_badges_live_healthy: Earn badges, get detailed progress metrics, and live healthy faster!
paywall.keep_a_drink_log: Keep a detailed log of every beverage, from refreshing juices to your favorite cocktails. Understand the impact of each drink on your eating habits.
paywall.number_one_predictor: The #1 Predictor Of Success With ANY Eating Plan Is Accountability!
paywall.see_how_your_beverages: See how your beverages affect your eating habits.
paywall.take_part_in_challenges: Take part in diverse eating challenges to help break bad habits and increase mindfulness.
paywall.thank_you_for_supporting: Thank you for supporting the project!
paywall.when_you_upgrade: Get instant access to beverage tracking and eating habits challenges, complete with progress bars and achievement badges.

cloud.there_was_a_problem: There was a problem logging in to Google Drive. Please contact us if the problem persists.
cloud.to_protect_your_privacy: To protect your privacy, we will store the backups on your Google Drive.

basic.title: Back to Basics
basic.short_description: Build awareness of your body‚Äôs signals.
basic.description:
Observe your eating habits for 6 days.

Before, during, and after meals, tune into your hunger, stay present, and check in with your fullness levels.

lasting_balance.title: Lasting Balance
lasting_balance.short_description: Turn healthy practices into lifelong habits.
lasting_balance.description: This challenge set is designed to help you develop sustainable eating habits that promote mindfulness and moderation.

tracks.please_finish_other_challenges: Please finish or exit other challenges before starting this track
tracks.track_is_unavailable: This track is not available yet. Please complete the "{{track}}" track first.

tune_in.title: Tune In & Reflect
tune_in.short_description: Explore and develop healthier eating practices.
tune_in.description: Discover mindful eating by listening to your body, enjoying meals fully, jotting down thoughts, and practicing balance, especially in the evening.
